tool_description: Checks if an Latitude/Longitude or Street Address is within Crimea (the Crimean Peninsula)
name: Crimea Check
title: Crimea Check

api_list.name: crimea_check.api
api_list.description: Checks if an Latitude/Longitude or Street Address is within Crimea (the Crimean Peninsula)

optional_parameters.name: longitude
optional_parameters.description: The Longitude of the location to check.  This parameter is optional if the Street Address is set, but REQUIRED if Latitude is set.

optional_parameters.name: latitude
optional_parameters.description: The Latitude of the location to check.  This parameter is optional if the Street Address is set, but REQUIRED if Longitude is set.

optional_parameters.name: street_address
optional_parameters.description: The Street Address of the location to check.  This parameter is optional if latitude and longitude are set.
